short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that lets you know if you have a tab already opened with the same URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension list down and groups all your tabs with same origin. You can access the list in the popup and navigate or close the tab from there. Also you are prompted with notification when same origin is detected during opening of new tab, clicking on notification closes all other instances with same origin in URL.
